name: BuffaloTriviaGame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: buffalo trivia game
des: In this trivia adventure, come and learn about the great and miserable players, coaches, stadiums, and moments in the history of Buffalo athletics. From the high of advancing to four straight Super Bowls to the low of a 16 year playoff drought, this game gives the user a fun and enriching experience that will test his or her knowledge while also educating him or her on the roller coaster that is sports. Most importantly, come to know how this city survives and endures with constant failures and ridicule through a fun and nourishing way.!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
